text: Firefox Focus is a open source web browser for iOS and Android. It was released in 2015, and started as a tracker blocker for iOS devices, but it later became a small web browser although it can still be used only as a tracker blocker on iOS. In 2017, the first release for Android was released and it was downloaded 1 million times in its first month of release. The browser came supporting 27 languages. Since 2018, Blackberry Key 2 had Firefox Focus installed as a part of app called Locker. == References == Category:Mozilla Firefox
title: Firefox Focus
